ygData.subject: Clarity requested
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok Jythri i see some repeating questions on this board, and i would like it if you could clear the most often stated ones up.  thanks 1.  what servers?  is
ygData.messageBody:
Ok Jythri i see some repeating questions on this board, and i would like it if you could clear the most often stated ones up. thanks
1. what servers? is this all servers or a specific?

2. what if you are already a high level and would still like to join. i already have the patchwork armor, drum and lute. should i still pay the 10pp if i don't get these bonuses?

3. what is the patron thing? i've never met one of you so how would i get a patron?

anyway just help us out here because i can tell some of our brethren are interested but confused.

Olczyk 8th year student of the music in Qeynos residing in the plane of Tarew Marr
